title: Ticket #6671: Invalid REQUIREMENTS for JOB_TRANSFORMS silently become TRUE
description:
When using the new job transform syntax, it is possible to have a REQUIREMENTS expression that does not parse. When this happens the xform_utils library just silently ignores the REQUIREMENTS statement, this producing an transform that applies to everything.

CERN ran into this with this tranform 

transform with broken requirements
JOB_TRANSFORM_AFSJob @=end
    NAME AFSJob
    REQUIREMENTS (JobUniverse =!= 7 && JobUniverse =!= 9) # move to AFSJob in future
    COPY Requirements PreAfsRequirements
    SET Requirements (TARGET.NODE_MOUNTS_AFS =?= True) && PreAfsRequirements
    @end

Which has unparsable requirements because end-of-line comments are not a thing.
